languages.text: {n}Не успеваете вы договорить, как в руке Висиря появляется изогнутый кинжал. Сталь блестит в воздухе, и пять отсеченных пальцев летят вам под ноги. Недрогнувшим голосом старец произносит:{/n} "Тебя прогневали мы. Мы — виновны". {n}Пергаментная кожа культиста становится еще бледнее. Аккуратно перевязывая искалеченную руку, он низко склоняет голову.{/n} "Позорно стоять пред тобой мне, Домин. Прошу, прими извинения культа. Мои извинения. Мне стыдно".
"Твоя кара справедлива, {name}, ибо я действительно нарушил свое слово. Но я не жалею о содеянном — исполнить знамение было важнее всего. Я с радостью приму эти страдания".

{n}Before you can finish your sentence, a curved dagger appears in the Vizsier's hand. There is a flash of steel in the air, and five severed fingers land at your feet. He says, his voice unfaltering,{/n} "We have displeased you. We are guilty." {n}His parchment-like skin grows even paler. He carefully bandages his maimed hand, then bows his head low.{/n} "It is disgraceful for me to stand before you, Domin. I beg you to accept the cult's apologies. My apologies. I am ashamed."

Недрогнувшим голосом старец произносит:{/n} "Тебя прогневали мы. Мы — виновны". {n}Пергаментная кожа культиста становится еще бледнее. Аккуратно перевязывая искалеченную руку, он низко склоняет голову.{/n} "Позорно стоять пред тобой мне, Домин. Прошу, прими извинения культа. Мои извинения. Мне стыдно".

languages.text: {n}Antes de que puedas terminar tu frase, aparece una daga curva en la mano del Visir. El acero destella en el aire y cinco dedos caen cortados a tus pies. Dice con voz firme:{/n} «L{mf|e|a} hemos contrariado. Somos culpables». {n}Su piel apergaminada se vuelve aún más pálida. Se venda cuidadosamente la mano mutilada y agacha inmediatamente la cabeza.{/n} «Mi presencia ante usted es una deshonra, Domin. Le ruego que acepte las disculpas del culto. Mis disculpas. Estoy avergonzado».
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can finish your sentence, a curved dagger appears in the Vizsier's hand. There is a flash of steel in the air, and five severed fingers land at your feet. He says, his voice unfaltering,{/n} "We have displeased you. We are guilty." {n}His parchment-like skin grows even paler. He carefully bandages his maimed hand, then bows his head low.{/n} "It is disgraceful for me to stand before you, Domin. I beg you to accept the cult's apologies. My apologies. I am ashamed."

Se venda cuidadosamente la mano mutilada y agacha inmediatamente la cabeza.{/n} «Mi presencia ante usted es una deshonra, Domin. Le ruego que acepte las disculpas del culto. Mis disculpas. Estoy avergonzado».

languages.text: {n}言い終わらないうちに、ヴィジールの手にカーブした短剣が握られていた。空中に鋼鉄の閃光が走り、切断された5本の指がこちらの足元に転がる。男は声を荒げることなく言った。{/n}「あなたの機嫌を損ねた。我々は有罪だ」{n}男の羊皮紙のような肌はさらに青白くなる。傷ついた手に丁寧に包帯を巻き、深く頭を下げた。{/n}「ドミン、あなたの前に立つのは恥ずべきことだ。どうか教団の謝罪を受け入れてくれ。悪かった。何という恥だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can finish your sentence, a curved dagger appears in the Vizsier's hand. There is a flash of steel in the air, and five severed fingers land at your feet. He says, his voice unfaltering,{/n} "We have displeased you. We are guilty." {n}His parchment-like skin grows even paler. He carefully bandages his maimed hand, then bows his head low.{/n} "It is disgraceful for me to stand before you, Domin. I beg you to accept the cult's apologies. My apologies. I am ashamed."

traits.locale_text: {n}言い終わらないうちに、ヴィジールの手にカーブした短剣が握られていた。空中に鋼鉄の閃光が走り、切断された5本の指がこちらの足元に転がる。男は声を荒げることなく言った。{/n}「あなたの機嫌を損ねた。我々は有罪だ」{n}男の羊皮紙のような肌はさらに青白くなる。傷ついた手に丁寧に包帯を巻き、深く頭を下げた。{/n}「エニム、あなたの前に立つのは恥ずべきことだ。どうか教団の謝罪を受け入れてくれ。悪かった。何という恥だ」

languages.text: {n}你还没来得及说完话，宿老的手中就出现了一把弯曲的匕首。随后，一道金属的冷光闪过，五根断手指落在你的脚边。宿老以坚定的语气开了口。{/n}“我们惹怒了您，我们有罪。”{n}他原本就像羊皮纸一样的皮肤，此刻变得更加苍白。他小心翼翼地包扎好了残损的手，之后低下头。{/n}“我心怀愧疚，站在您的面前，秘者。我乞求您接受教派的道歉。我很抱歉，我满心惭愧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can finish your sentence, a curved dagger appears in the Vizsier's hand. There is a flash of steel in the air, and five severed fingers land at your feet. He says, his voice unfaltering,{/n} "We have displeased you. We are guilty." {n}His parchment-like skin grows even paler. He carefully bandages his maimed hand, then bows his head low.{/n} "It is disgraceful for me to stand before you, Domin. I beg you to accept the cult's apologies. My apologies. I am ashamed."

traits.locale_text: {n}你还没来得及说完话，宿老的手中就出现了一把弯曲的匕首。随后，一道金属的冷光闪过，五根断手指落在你的脚边。宿老以坚定的语气开了口。{/n}“我们惹怒了您，我们有罪。”{n}他原本就像羊皮纸一样的皮肤，此刻变得更加苍白。他小心翼翼地包扎好了残损的手，之后低下头。{/n}“我心怀愧疚，站在您的面前，秘者。我乞求您接受教派的道歉。我很抱歉，我满心惭愧。”

languages.text: {n}Ehe du deinen Satz vollenden kannst, erscheint in der Hand des Wesirs ein Krummdolch. Stahl blitzt durch die Luft, und vor deinen Füßen landen fünf abgetrennte Finger. Er sagt mit fester Stimme:{/n} "Wir haben Euch enttäuscht. Wir sind schuldig." {n}Seine pergamentartige Haut wird noch blasser. Er verbindet sich vorsichtig die verstümmelte Hand und senkt dann tief den Kopf.{/n} "Es ist eine Schande für mich, vor Euch zu stehen, Domin. Ich flehe Euch an, die Entschuldigung des Kults anzunehmen. Meine Entschuldigung. Ich schäme mich."
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can finish your sentence, a curved dagger appears in the Vizsier's hand. There is a flash of steel in the air, and five severed fingers land at your feet. He says, his voice unfaltering,{/n} "We have displeased you. We are guilty." {n}His parchment-like skin grows even paler. He carefully bandages his maimed hand, then bows his head low.{/n} "It is disgraceful for me to stand before you, Domin. I beg you to accept the cult's apologies. My apologies. I am ashamed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ehe du deinen Satz vollenden kannst, erscheint in der Hand des Wesirs ein Krummdolch. Stahl blitzt durch die Luft, und vor deinen Füßen landen fünf abgetrennte Finger. Er sagt mit fester Stimme:{/n} "Wir haben Euch enttäuscht. Wir sind schuldig." {n}Seine pergamentartige Haut wird noch blasser. Er verbindet sich vorsichtig die verstümmelte Hand und senkt dann tief den Kopf.{/n} "Es ist eine Schande für mich, vor Euch zu stehen, Domin. Ich flehe Euch an, die Entschuldigung des Kults anzunehmen. Meine Entschuldigung. Ich schäme mich."

languages.text: {n}Avant que vous ayez le temps de finir votre phrase, une dague à lame courbe apparaît dans la main du vizir. L'éclat du métal fend l'air et cinq doigts tombent aussitôt à vos pieds. Il s'exclame d'une voix résolue :{/n} « Nous sommes coupables de vous avoir {mf|mécontenté|mécontentée}. » {n}Sa peau parcheminée devient encore plus pâle alors qu'il panse sa main mutilée avant d'incliner la tête.{/n} « Je ne suis pas digne de paraître ainsi devant vous, Domin. C'est la honte au front que je vous supplie de bien vouloir accepter les excuses du culte, à commencer par les miennes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can finish your sentence, a curved dagger appears in the Vizsier's hand. There is a flash of steel in the air, and five severed fingers land at your feet. He says, his voice unfaltering,{/n} "We have displeased you. We are guilty." {n}His parchment-like skin grows even paler. He carefully bandages his maimed hand, then bows his head low.{/n} "It is disgraceful for me to stand before you, Domin. I beg you to accept the cult's apologies. My apologies. I am ashamed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avant que vous ayez le temps de finir votre phrase, une dague à lame courbe apparaît dans la main du vizir. Il s'exclame d'une voix résolue :{/n} « Nous sommes coupables de vous avoir {mf|mécontenté|mécontentée}. » {n}Sa peau parcheminée devient encore plus pâle alors qu'il panse sa main mutilée avant d'incliner la tête.{/n} « Je ne suis pas digne de paraître ainsi devant vous, Domin. C'est la honte au front que je vous supplie de bien vouloir accepter les excuses du culte, à commencer par les miennes. »

languages.text: {n}Sen daha cümleni bitiremeden Vezir'in elinde eğimli bir hançer beliriyor. Havada metalin parıltısının belirmesiyle birlikte kesilen beş parmak, ayaklarının dibine düşüyor. Tereddütsüz bir ses tonuyla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sizi gücendirdik. Suçluyuz." {n}Parşömeni andıran derisi, daha da solgunlaşıyor. Yaralı elini titizlikle sarıp ardından başını öne eğiyor.{/n} "Huzurunuzda dikilmek yüzümü kızartıyor Domin. Tarikatın özürlerini, benim özürlerimi kabul etmeniz için size yalvarıyorum. Utanç içindeyim."
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can finish your sentence, a curved dagger appears in the Vizsier's hand. There is a flash of steel in the air, and five severed fingers land at your feet. He says, his voice unfaltering,{/n} "We have displeased you. We are guilty." {n}His parchment-like skin grows even paler. He carefully bandages his maimed hand, then bows his head low.{/n} "It is disgraceful for me to stand before you, Domin. I beg you to accept the cult's apologies. My apologies. I am ashamed."
